errors.error_description: The order of commands for cloning the repository and changing into the new directory is incorrect. The user must clone the repository before they can `cd` into it.
correction_candidates: Correct order: `git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf` followed by `cd pysiaf`
Combined command: `git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf && cd pysiaf`
Change `cd pysiaf` to `mkdir pysiaf && cd pysiaf` before cloning.
errors.golden_answer: Correct order: `git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf` followed by `cd pysiaf`
